title: 100% Pure Himalayan Salt "Single Soap" Bar
description:
This Indus Classic salt deodorant bar has no harmful chemicals or metals! 

Himalayan salt kills the bacteria that causes odors. Just wet and use like a regular deodorant bar. Can be used all over your body--try it on smelly feet. Won't clog pores or stain clothes. 

Size and shape may vary, our choice, please. All-natural bar of Himalayan salt lasts for months.

"This item is perfect to replace that old dingy piece of soap in your shower, or to be used as a foot pumice. This smooth Himalayan Salt can also replace your deodorant! Remove unwanted dead skin and unwanted bacterium from your body. As salt is a very clean form, you will be happy with your Indus Classic 100% Pure Himalayan Salt ""Soap"" Bar!"
